item.title: vaDa-ten-kalai-bhedaH
item.description: वरदराज-सूनु-मणिः Historians say that the deep division that you’ve witnessed is a product of lesser minds a century or two after Manavala Mamuni’s death. Certainly, there were differences in emphasis on grace, karma, etc., and surrender (prapatti), but the greatest teachers on either side had no intention of causing a split. In fact Vedanta Desika says in one of his works that “In the tradition of Yatiraja (Ramanuja), there is no division; there is only a small difference in opinion.
